logic

Class HotelSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.HotelSystem

  • public class HotelSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    HotelSystem class is main class for controlling all system object of this class contains all needed getters and setters for this program to run. This class must extend controller object to create user interface.

      • authorize

        public java.lang.Boolean authorize(User.Data userData,
                                   java.lang.String passFilePath)
        Method preforms very basic authentication routine.
        Parameters:
        userData - Data object from User class, containing name, surname and user type.
        passFilePath - File path which contains passwords.
        Returns:
        true or false.
